channel.title: Marketing Analytics & Automation on
channel.description: Recent content in Marketing Analytics & Automation on

item.title: Web Analytics with Similarweb: from Basic to PRO!
item.description: Knowledge is power for business in a highly competitive modern environment. To be successful in digital marketing you need to analyze what your competitors are doing and expose their digital strategy, discover market trends so that to take necessary actions, understand your customers, and explore bottom-of-the-funnel metrics to drive more sales. In this course, we will teach you how to use a great tool - Similarweb, a digital intelligence provider for enterprises and small to mid-sized businesses, that will deliver you web analytics and insights on competitors' web traffic and performance, target audience behavior, and customer demand, keyword research and other deep data needed for decision-making of strategic planning and tactical execution.

item.title: Marketing Analytics: Customer Value and Promotion Strategy
item.description: You're looking for a complete course that will teach you how to calculate customer value to drive business decisions involving product pricing, acquisition cost, marketing cost, and many other parts of the business., right? You've found the right course Customer Valuation for Entrepreneurs and Marketers! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different methods to find customer lifetime value and how to find it in Excel using advanced excel tool.

item.title: Grow your sales with Conversion Optimization Rate
item.description: Do you want to start your first conversion optimization campaign? Are you interested in increasing your online sales but afraid of going over budget? Do you want to reach new customers and increase sales? This is an in-depth course to get started with CRO. In this CRO training, we will walk through all the steps of launching an effective rate optimization. In this practical class, you will get a complete understanding of how to efficiently work with CRO tactics and create successful campaigns to get loyal customers, increase traffic, and grow your business online.

item.title: Marketing Analytics: Forecasting Models with Excel
item.description: You're looking for a complete course on understanding Forecasting models and forecasting analytics to drive business decisions involving production schedules, inventory management, manpower planning, demand forecasting, and many other parts of the business., right? You've found the right Marketing Analytics: Forecasting Models with Excel! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different forecasting models and how to implement these models for devising forecasting analytics in Excel using advanced excel tool.

item.title: Google Analytics, GA4, GTM. How to improve your marketing?
item.description: Description Web analytics is the pulse of digital marketing. Everything is measured, and everything is measurable. With Google Analytics and a call tracking system, you can clearly understand who your client is, how to improve your site, and which traffic sources are the most beneficial for your business. What will you learn in this course? After completing this course, you will learn how to work with and get the most out of your web analytics data.

item.title: Marketing Analytics: Pricing Strategies and Price Analytics
item.description: You're looking for a complete course on pricing strategies and pricing analytics that maximize your firm revenue/profit, right? You've found the right Marketing Analytics: Pricing Strategies course! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different pricing strategies and how to implement it using profit maximizing price points. After completing this course you will be able to: Implement pricing strategies such as simple linear pricing, price bundling, giving quantity discount, price skimming, applying two part tariffs and many more.

item.title: Marketing Analytics and Retail Business Management
item.description: You're looking for a complete course on understanding Marketing Analytics and Retail Business Management to drive business decisions involving production schedules, inventory management, promotional mail optimization, store layouting, estimating right bundle price, customer valuation and many other parts of the business., right? You've found the right Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management course! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different forecasting models, Market Basket analysis, conducting market research, marketing analytics, RFM (recency, frequency, monetary) analysis, Customer Valuation methods & Price Bundling analysis and how to implement these models in Excel using advanced excel tool.

item.title: 2022 Google Analytics Individual Qualification Pro Tests
item.description: Are you ready to become Google Analytics Individual Qualified ? Do you know the advantages to be Google Analytics Individual Qualified ? Welcome to 2021 Google Analytics Individual Qualification Test 97% Pass in First Attempt Easily 2021 Google Analytics Individual Qualification Test Become expert in Google Analytics and pass Google Analytics Certification test in just 100 Questions and answers The Analytics Individual Qualification is a demonstration of proficiency in Analytics that is available to any individual who has passed the Analytics IQ exam.

item.title: Advanced Google Analytics + Regex using Examples | 2021
item.description: Google Analytics Reports were not as EASY and EFFECTIVEÂ before. Learn Tricky Reporting techniques to find valuable information that will increase your avg. session duration, Conversion Rate and overall ROI. Clarity in the cluster of data is essential. Learn Advanced Google Analytics with Regex. This is the best Google Analytics Expert Training Program that you are going to find to build your Analysis, Reporting and Web Optimization Expertise. This Google Analytics Expert Program will teach you the advanced settings as well as take you through basics that help you with achieving goals and KPIs by going through clutter of data and finding the useful information that you need to know to ease your decision making.
